Other Links<-->
Have fun! 
 
Long ago, the programmer and his family lived together in harmony. Then, everything changed when the fire nation attac- I mean, when the application came into existence. Only the programmer, the creator of this madness, could stop the world-ending disappointment that is this application, but when the programmer needed his family most, they vanished. 
 
A hundred years had passed and the programmer found a clue to locate his family, a note that said that his family disowned him. Although the programmer spent 69,420 years on detective work to find his family, he could never find any of them. He never understood what the initials XY on the envelope stood for. 
 
How Unfortunate. 
 
Do not be like the programmer. Fear the initials. 
 
 
Undertale, Undertale 
Does whatever skeletons do 
Spook people, In closets 
Intercourse, with your mom 
Look out! He is Sans Undertale 
 
How Unfortunate. 
 
 
www.royalroad.com 
 
www.novelupdates.com 
 
www.mangadex.com 
 
www.reddit.com 
 
RAID SHADOW LEGENDS
